text:
Hey there, nice to meet you! I'm Elena Galli (she/her); I'm Italian but based in The Netherlands.
I'm an English native speaker, and I work as a Content and Social Media Marketer for a tech scale-up.

I've been wearing plenty of hats over the past three years! I write SEO-optimized blog posts, social media copy, newsletters, and more. In fact, over the past year, I have also scripted, filmed, and hosted an <https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLP52yn5aQiYH57hbitnpv4FBOPOTp5frv|edutainment video series for recruiters>. Branded, long-form content is my favorite.
I aspire to become a highly specialized content creator and to work remotely :earth_africa:

When I'm not at my desk, I'm taking a long walk with a true-crime podcast, at the movie theater, reading a book in a cafe, or cooking for my friends:woman-walking::film_projector: :books: :spaghetti:
<https://www.linkedin.com/in/elenaclaudiagalli/|Let's connect on LinkedIn>!

text: Hi everyone, my name is Jelena and I work at <http://Skylead.io|Skylead.io> as a content and copywriter. I mostly write about sales, B2B marketing, outreach, and lead generation. I am really excited to be part of this community. Hopefully, I will be able to contribute with my content and insights, as well as learn from you all. :slightly_smiling_face: If anyone wants to connect on LinkedIn or check out my work, here's a link <http://linkedin.com/in/jelenacerovic|linkedin.com/in/jelenacerovic> :dancer:

text:
Hey everyone! Greetings from Atlantic Canada :anchor:
I'm currently head of demand growth at <http://bungalow.com|bungalow.com>. On the side, I'm a freelance performance marketer and am building out the <http://www.theprefablist.com|internet's biggest marketplace of prefab buildings>. Great to be here!

text: Hello!! My name is Veronica (she/her/ella) and I work as the Senior Manager, Content Strategy at <https://fiscalnote.com/|FiscalNote>. I’m originally from Caracas, Venezuela but I’ve been living in Washington, D.C. for the past 10 years. My background is in business journalism and trade publications but made the switch to content marketing last year. I love strategizing and finding the best ways and formats to tell each story. In my spare time I play drums for my band <https://open.spotify.com/artist/2XvAvio9LX8gsaUD01hScq?si=rNWkhIzfRuC0wUxzVA02IQ&nd=1|Teen Cobra>.

text: Hello everyone! My name is Ricardo Gil and i'm a Lisbon based independent Digital Marketing Professional, Business Consultant and Certified Trainer with over 12 years experience worldwide. I provide a range of data-driven solutions designed to meet clients specific business needs, improving digital strategy and results. I'm really excited to be here and learn a lot from you all. Feel free do add me on Linkedin: <http://linkedin.com/in/ricsgil|linkedin.com/in/ricsgil> and visite my personal website: <http://ricardo-gil.com|ricardo-gil.com>.

text:
Howdy folks :wave: Waving hello from Sacramento, CA. I run two agencies:
• :banana: An SEO and SEM agency where we specialize in lead generation (<https://www.Bananas.agency|Bananas.agency>) 
• :bug:  Another where we only do SEO and SEM for pest control companies (<http://PestyMarketing.com|PestyMarketing.com>). 
I've been in marketing for 6 years and although my focus is in search marketing I love nerding out on copywriting, branding, UX, email marketing, content marketing, and CRO. Happy to connect with anyone who wants to nerd out with me!

Since I believe the best communities are built on members taking part in conversation and contributing to the collective, I'll start off by sharing a couple of potentially helpful internal documents (feel free to make a copy for yourself):
1. <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1nmrsCNlKYSSB5TF2yrp5Nhi9wQZ9QV7nvTX9kGrL1IQ/edit?usp=sharing|Cold Email Checklist> - My team does a lot of link building for clients, so it's critical that our outbound emails don't land in the spam folder. This document illustrates how we get to the inbox.
2. <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1JaQ8xVRVgVLRWkBfHof0OLtm_ebd-XIACDcPznKzMJA/edit?usp=sharing|Content Brief> - If you work with writers, you know how important the content brief is! If done right, it can save them a ton of time and improve their deliverable. This is our content brief template that we use for every piece of content we create for clients.
Thanks for having me, <@UJG9WTEKG>. Looking forward to learning from and chatting with everyone here!

text: Hi everyone, my name is Elena. I am CEO and co-founder of <https://evidentlyai.com|Evidently AI>. It is an open-source startup developing tools for data scientists and machine learning engineers. We are pretty early, but content turned out to be one of the core growth channels for us with lots of our users referencing our blog. Right now we work on it as a founding team, but that won't scale down the line :slightly_smiling_face: I look to learn best practices especially when it comes to scaling technical content creation and building the right strategy around it. Happy to connect <https://www.linkedin.com/in/elenasamuylova/|on Linkedin> too!

text: Welcome, Elena! My company actually has a whole practice around helping startups scale their content creation. Happy to chat about our approach and share some tips.
